data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Palghar, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Palghar, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Palghar, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Palghar unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 759 believers in Palghar, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Teli Ganiga (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, bring yourself glory in Palghar. Through your servants plant 13 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Palghar, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 67,404, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

location.name: Palghar
location.people_groups_list: Valmiki, Balmiki Lal Begi  (Hindu traditions), Jew, South Asian, Sinhalese, Brahmin Anavada, Kamathi
